chunks.text: A dictionary is one of the four basic collection types for beginners.

chunks.title: co
chunks.text: A dictionary consists of key value pairs.

chunks.title: co
chunks.text: They are ordered and changeable.

chunks.title: co
chunks.text: No duplicates allowed.

chunks.title: co
chunks.text: A few examples of key value pairs could be...

chunks.title: co
chunks.text: an ID, and a name, an item, and a price.

chunks.title: co
chunks.text: But in today's example we'll create a dictionary of countries and capitals.

chunks.title: co

chunks.title: co
chunks.text: The capital of the USA will be Washington, D.C.

chunks.title: co
chunks.text: Separate each key value pair with the comma, then we can add another key value pair.

chunks.title: co
